app_name: Groups Control Groups Messenger Apps 2U.Chat Make Foreign Friends
app_description: 2U.Chat is more than a messaging and social media app it is a lifestyle for one billion users across the world. Chat make translate call one to one chat group chat voice chat video chat with friends share your life to Memories and much more. Why do we use 2U.Chat TRANSLATE CALLS: Supports real time intelligent translation calls between 20 languages. MULTIMEDIA MESSAGES: Supports sending video images text and voice messages. GROUP CHATS AND CALLS: Create group chats with up to 1000 people and real time video chats with up to 9 people. VOICE AND VIDEO CHATS: Provides high quality voice and video calls to anywhere in the world. STICKER GALLERY: Browse thousands of fun animated stickers to help express yourself in chats including stickers with your favorite cartoon and movie characters. MEMORIES: Never forget your favorite memories. Post photos videos and more to share with others on your personal Memories stream. FIND NEW FRIENDS: Find and add new friends through Shake and sharing Contact . REAL TIME LOCATION: Not good at explaining directions Share your real time location with the tap of a button. LANGUAGE SUPPORT: Localized in 20 different languages and can translate friends messages and Moments posts. MORE FUNCTIONS: Support Interpreter Assets News etc. EASY MODE: Clearer and larger text and buttons for better readability.
